modName: Legend of Zelda Curse of Majora
summary: A remake of Legend of Zelda Majoras Mask aimed to br
descriptionHtml:
Let me start of with: I do not own the rights to the Legend of Zelda franchise wich is why this is going to be non profit, it is a free mod.
___________________________________________________________________________________________

Basicaly this mod is gonna be an overhaul to remake the story of Majora's Mask, with the landscape of the original re-created as a tribute to the original,
All characters from the old game will have their own appearance, and the mechanics of the repeating Day cycle will occur in this mod, the puzzles in the dungeons aswell and switching between races with the masks being equipped and unequipped, as you can most likely understand, this is going to be a large project wich is why I have listed down below what we are in need of!

____________________________________________________________________________________________
We are in desperate need of:
Mapper
Modeller
Texturer
2d Artist
Sound Artist
Coder
_______________________________________________________________
. If you want to help, PM Dennizjoon on the nexus.
Link to profile: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2357160/?
author: Dennizjoon
